Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 3/3/1987 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Chicago to Montreal on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: CF Ken Griffey Jr., 1B Cecil Fielder, C Craig Biggio, C Rick Wilkins. Going to CHC: P Randy Johnson)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/10/1990, off Kevin J. Brown (ATL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 4/10/1990...
Injured on 6/21/1990 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
